DOC.brief_summary: Prospective study include 6 group 20 patient total hip prosthesis . Five different type metal-on-metal prosthesis study , 1 group ceramic-on-ceramic prosthesis act control group . Patients undergo clinical evaluation blood sample preoperatively , 3 , 6 , 12 24 month postoperatively .
DOC.brief_title: Dosage Metal Ions Blood Different Metal-on-metal Prostheses , Correlation With Physical Activity
